concept.title: Better Image support
concept.shortdesc: The plugin offers the different options for images.

section.title: Standard images
section.p: The attribute @class of body element controls general layout of the page. If the @class contains the value img-with-shadow, then all images will have a drop shadow by default.

section.title: SVG support
section.p: It use the object element to be output. This example use the under the license as an example.
